text: Bryan Ikemefuna Okoh (born 16 May 2003) is a Swiss professional footballer. He plays as centre back for 2. Liga club Liefering and for the UEFA Youth League team of FC Salzburg. He is born in the United States but plays for the Switzerland U21 national team. ==Career== Okoh began his career with FC Espagnol Lausanne. 2016/17 he joined the youth team of FC Lausanne-Sport. 2019/20 he went to Austria and signed for FC Red Bull Salzburg. He was transferred to the farm team FC Liefering. In August 2019 he played his first match for Liefering versus SV Lafnitz. 2021/22 he became part of the first team. He can also go on playing for Liefering. ==National team== He played for the Switzerland U15, U16, U17 and U21 national teams. In November 2021 he was part of the Switzerland national football team. During the training he suffered a Cruciate ligament tear and would not play for a year.Homepage FC Red Bull Salzburg ==Honours== * Austrian Champion: 2022 * Austrian Cup: 2022 ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Liefering players Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:Austrian football champions
title: Bryan Okoh
